name: Flick Bricker
description:
Flick Bricker. Conceptualized and programmed in 24 hours in 2007 by Rand Barnett. A classic combination of two popular grid games (which they won't allow me to mention here) with my own twist (Moth, Peace Bomb, Hazards).

Graphics by Brandon Lehor!!

I taught myself programming while living on the streets. Support programmers. It takes hard work to make something like this happen. 24 hours + 5 years of full time study. Your generous donation could help me buy 1/3 of a fast food meal.

Like one of the games this takes after, this is a great skill game that does not have a fast paced time limit (unlike the other game this takes after). Music and sound is purposely left out.
